pullRequest.title: [MOB-2285] - Add OS version to getMessagesAPI
pullRequest.bodyText:
🔹 Jira Ticket(s) if any
https://iterable.atlassian.net/browse/MOB-2285
✏️ Description

Added systemVersion to getMessageApi json
Added test assertion to check if systemVersion is passed

nodes.bodyText: Even though DEVICE_SYSTEM_VERSION has the same value, systemVersion, it is prefixed with DEVICE_, which means it is a property of a device record sent to registerDeviceToken. I think in this case it may be better to add another constant.

commit.message:
[MOB-2285] - Add OS version to getMessagesAPI

1. Added systemVersion to getMessageApi json
2. Added test assertion to check if systemVersion is passed
